summary: This module implements the PrismaEngine, which orchestrates the full lifecycle of Prisma-based static application security testing. It prepares scan artifacts, invokes Prisma scans across supported platforms, aggregates findings, applies policy and severity thresholds, and produces structured reports. Supporting utilities retrieve machine configuration and reachability data for enhanced analysis.
